alert.note: Alert for Howard; Merrick; Nance; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 12:09PM CST until January 02 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SUNDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 25 to 30 below zero. * WHERE...Howard, Sherman, Nance and Merrick Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until midnight CST tonight. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Expect areas of drifting snow. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
